page.title: 01Mid-Nbld - unpretty farmland
page.content: General character as blocks 04160594 and 04160591, which see, but here much brutalised. Squares 1 & 2 hedges removed (road no longer fenced even). The only example in 36 square kilometres. Square 6 - West Moor, a row of dreary bungalows and huge rey farm buildings. The rough grazing there flat and reedy - adds to ugliness. Squares 7 & 8 old aerodrome. Road system dislocated:; former runways etc, everywhere; now-meanigless structures, RAF buildings crumbling to ruin, dumps of soil or broken concrete, all dotted about. Amidst the clutter, the same farming is practised as in the ordinary countryside. The aerodrome also supports a major specialist sport - the Northumbrian Kart Club international kart racing track.
